verses.name: Psalms 44:10
verses.text: Thou makest us to turn back from the enemy: and they which hate us spoil for themselves.

verses.name: Psalms 44:11
verses.text: Thou hast given us like sheep appointed for meat; and hast scattered us among the heathen.

verses.name: Psalms 44:12
verses.text: Thou sellest thy people for nought, and dost not increase thy wealth by their price.

verses.name: Psalms 44:13
verses.text: Thou makest us a reproach to our neighbours, a scorn and a derision to them that are round about us.

verses.name: Psalms 44:14
verses.text: Thou makest us a byword among the heathen, a shaking of the head among the people.

verses.name: Psalms 44:15
verses.text: My confusion is continually before me, and the shame of my face hath covered me,
